channel.title: How to make wild for different places. Pk box for instance
channel.description: Alright. I want to add a Pk box for my server. I have tryed everything besides posting on Moparscape. Can anyone tell me how to add a Pk box? Also to make it so when people die in that Pk box they do not loose anything. Thank you all!

item.title: How to make wild for different places. Pk box for instance
item.dc:creator: @xX_Energy_xX xX_Energy_xX
item.description:
@xX_Energy_xX wrote:

it depends where it isâ€¦
if its like the mage arena, you already have a pk zone, so just add globalobjects to it and a teleport or portal and your good to go.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make wild for different places. Pk box for instance

item.title: How to make wild for different places. Pk box for instance
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you are using DeltaScape, isInWilderness boolean.

Other sources, nonWild boolean or create an inWild boolean.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make wild for different places. Pk box for instance
